articles.description: Albion match-winner Kyle Bartley admits he has relied on resilience to recover from setbacks this season – but insists fans should have opinions.
articles.content: The 31-year-old defender was the unlikely goal hero as Albion made it back-to-back wins for the first time this season with a 1-0 win at QPR as the encouraging start to life under Carlos Corberan gat… [+2458 chars]

articles.author: Oliver Holt
articles.title: FIFA created this sick joke of a Qatar World Cup... begging us to look away now is laughable - Daily Mail
articles.description: OLIVER HOLT: I would like to commend FIFA on their latest attempt to silence dissent surrounding the staging of a tournament awarded in that magnificent carnival of venality.
articles.content:
Dear President and Secretary-General,
The FIFA World Cup in Qatar is now just around the corner and excitement about the worlds premier football festival should be building globally as we count down… [+8720 chars]

articles.title: Gareth Southgate prepared to be 'completely ruthless' to help England succeed in Qatar - Daily Mail
articles.description: Southgate has been lauded as a national treasure and alternative Prime Minister since. And lambasted as a 'fraud' and the 'man who cost us the Euros on that horrible evening last year.
